alert.note: Alert for Adams; Allen (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 9:27PM EST until March 08 at 5:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana...Ohio... Michigan... Salamonie River at Portland affecting Jay County. Saint Marys River near Decatur affecting Allen IN, Van Wert and Adams Counties. Saint Joseph River Michigan at Niles affecting St. Joseph, Cass MI and Berrien Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON TO WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saint Marys River near Decatur. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon to Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.5 feet, County road 225 north of Pleasant Mills is flooded. Agricultural land flooding increases in northern... central and eastern Adams County. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM EST Friday the stage was 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 17.8 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage by Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further statements and updated forecasts. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
